item.title: All Boeing 777s operated by Etihad Airways offer mobile and Internet connectivity
item.description: Etihad Airways has finished installing mobile and internet connectivity on all 24 of its Boeing 777 passenger planes. This allows passengers to stay connected while flying. Source: Etihad. In-flight connectivity becomes a reality. The airline plans to have its entire fleet of 89 passenger aircraft connected within the next few months. This will make Etihad Airways the first airline in its region and one of the few globally to offer mobile and internet connectivity on all its planes.
